posts.postText:
Moon's laptop video card sucks. This makes moon sad. Moon wants to upgrade his laptop's video card. How can he do this?

Dell inspiron 1764. I currently have an ATI radeon hd 4330. (lame 512 mbs)
Moon can't do it because it's integrated with the motherboard. :(

It's actually quite simple, just get an external graphics card.
